reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Strengthening Technical and Vocational Education and Training in priority vocational industries in China.

description.narrative: This project is designed to build the understanding of policy makers from key Chinese ministries of the strengths of UK vocational expertise. This will help identify opportunities where the UK can support China to develop and improve its wider policy and training models in priority vocational sectors, and facilitate international partnerships. This project will lay the groundwork for, and inform the design of, the multi-year Prosperity Fund Skills programme of the China Prosperity Portfolio. This programme will lead to a more skilled and productive workforce, helping China's ongoing transition to an inclusive, sustainable and productive economy. It will also generate opportunities for international business in the Skills and Education sectors, bringing potential benefits for British companies in sectors where they are well placed to compete.
